title: Ep. 104 Injured Wife, Happy Life - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and enter code WMMA for 50% off one item and 10 free gifts! - Go to https://Prose.com/mom for a FREE in-depth hair quiz and 15% off your first order. - Go to https://cbdMD.com and enter code YOURMOM for 25% off your next order - Go to https://FahertyBrand.com and enter code WMMA at checkout to snag 20% off ALL your summer gear! - Go to https://MunkPack.com enter the code WMMA at checkout to save 20% your purchase - Get 50% off your first month of a Helium 10 Platinum account when you go to https://Helium10.com/WMMA.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina broke her ankle! And so the main mommy is reporting from her home studio because moms never have a day off. On a lighter note, we find out which one of the booth boys would be the best and worst to room with, Victoria's Secret's new "successful model" campaign, and the ever important wiping debate. We dish out some pretty helpful advice to a couple of listeners about dudes with commitment issues and making a career changes so be sure to hear what Christina and the team have to say!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
